name: Euralio Alma
description: Alma was held by the sameRaffen ShivWraithsthat also captured and torturedSaul Bright. Vhas the option to kill or incapacitate him during their encounter. Should V decide against killing Euralio, he will inevitably succumb to his cyberpsychosis and injuries. His final resting place can be found at the AldecaldoMobile Campgraveyard.
